alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 6:29AM EST until February 26 at 6:03AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding expands into the pastures, fields, and woodlands upstream and downstream from the Keiths Mill Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EST Friday was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 12.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
